metadata.name: steward
metadata.description: Program for permissionlessly managing an SPL Stake Pool

instructions.name: add_validator_to_pool
docs: Passthrough spl-stake-pool: Add a validator to the pool

instructions.name: add_validators_to_blacklist
docs: Adds the validators to the blacklist. They will be instant unstaked and never receive delegations. Each u32 is a ValidatorHistory index.

instructions.name: admin_mark_for_removal
docs: Admin to mark or unmark validator for removal and unstuck the machine

instructions.name: auto_add_validator_to_pool
docs: Adds a validator to the pool if it has a validator history account, matches stake_minimum, and is not yet in the pool

instructions.name: auto_remove_validator_from_pool
docs: Removes a validator from the pool if its stake account is inactive or the vote account has closed

accounts.name: transient_stake_account
docs: Account may not exist yet so no owner check done

instructions.name: close_steward_accounts
docs: Closes Steward PDA accounts associated with a given Config (StewardStateAccount, and Staker).
Config is not closed as it is a Keypair, so lamports can simply be withdrawn.
Reclaims lamports to authority

instructions.name: compute_delegations
docs: Computes delegation for a validator for the current cycle.
All validators must have delegations computed before stake can be delegated

instructions.name: compute_instant_unstake
docs: Checks if a validator at `validator_list_index` should be instant unstaked, and marks it if so

instructions.name: compute_score
docs: Computes score for a the validator at `validator_list_index` for the current cycle.

instructions.name: decrease_additional_validator_stake
docs: Passthrough spl-stake-pool: Decrease additional validator stake

instructions.name: decrease_validator_stake
docs: Passthrough spl-stake-pool: Decrease validator stake

instructions.name: epoch_maintenance
docs: Housekeeping, run at the start of any new epoch before any other instructions

instructions.name: idle
docs: Idle state, waiting for epoch progress before transitioning to next state

instructions.name: increase_additional_validator_stake
docs: Passthrough spl-stake-pool: Increase additional validator stake

instructions.name: increase_validator_stake
docs: Passthrough spl-stake-pool: Increase validator stake

instructions.name: instant_remove_validator
docs: When a validator is marked for immediate removal, it needs to be removed before normal functions can continue

instructions.name: pause_steward
docs: Pauses the steward, preventing any further state transitions

instructions.name: realloc_state
docs: Increases state account by 10KiB each ix until it reaches StewardStateAccount::SIZE

instructions.name: rebalance
docs: Increases or decreases stake for a validator at `validator_list_index` to match the target stake,
given constraints on increase/decrease priority, reserve balance, and unstaking caps

accounts.name: transient_stake_account
docs: Account may not exist yet so no owner check done

instructions.name: remove_validator_from_pool
docs: Passthrough spl-stake-pool: Remove a validator from the pool

instructions.name: remove_validators_from_blacklist
docs: Removes the validators from the blacklist. Each u32 is a ValidatorHistory index.

instructions.name: reset_steward_state
docs: Resets steward state account to its initial state.

instructions.name: reset_validator_lamport_balances
docs: Reset validator_lamport_balances to default

instructions.name: resume_steward
docs: Resumes the steward, allowing state transitions to continue

instructions.name: set_preferred_validator
docs: Passthrough spl-stake-pool: Set the preferred validator

instructions.name: set_staker
docs: Passthrough spl-stake-pool: Set the staker for the pool

instructions.name: update_parameters
docs: For parameters that are present in args, the instruction checks that they are within sensible bounds and saves them to config struct

errors.name: InvalidAuthorityType
errors.msg: Invalid set authority type: 0: SetAdmin, 1: SetBlacklistAuthority, 2: SetParametersAuthority

errors.name: ScoringNotComplete
errors.msg: Scoring must be completed before any other steps can be taken

errors.name: ValidatorNotInList
errors.msg: Validator does not exist at the ValidatorList index provided

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Unauthorized to perform this action

errors.name: BitmaskOutOfBounds
errors.msg: Bitmask index out of bounds

errors.name: InvalidState
errors.msg: Invalid state

errors.name: StakeStateIsNotStake
errors.msg: Stake state is not Stake

errors.name: ValidatorBelowStakeMinimum
errors.msg: Validator not eligible to be added to the pool. Must meet stake minimum

errors.name: ValidatorBelowLivenessMinimum
errors.msg: Validator not eligible to be added to the pool. Must meet recent voting minimum

errors.name: VoteHistoryNotRecentEnough
errors.msg: Validator History vote data not recent enough to be used for scoring. Must be updated this epoch

errors.name: StakeHistoryNotRecentEnough
errors.msg: Validator History stake data not recent enough to be used for scoring. Must be updated this epoch

errors.name: ClusterHistoryNotRecentEnough
errors.msg: Cluster History data not recent enough to be used for scoring. Must be updated this epoch

errors.name: StateMachinePaused
errors.msg: Steward State Machine is paused. No state machine actions can be taken

errors.name: InvalidParameterValue
errors.msg: Config parameter is out of range or otherwise invalid

errors.name: InstantUnstakeNotReady
errors.msg: Instant unstake cannot be performed yet.

errors.name: ValidatorIndexOutOfBounds
errors.msg: Validator index out of bounds of state machine

errors.name: ValidatorListTypeMismatch
errors.msg: ValidatorList account type mismatch

errors.name: ArithmeticError
errors.msg: An operation caused an overflow/underflow

errors.name: ValidatorNotRemovable
errors.msg: Validator not eligible for removal. Must be delinquent or have closed vote account

errors.name: ValidatorMarkedActive
errors.msg: Validator was marked active when it should be deactivating

errors.name: MaxValidatorsReached
errors.msg: Max validators reached

errors.name: EpochMaintenanceNotComplete
errors.msg: Epoch Maintenance must be called before continuing

errors.name: StakePoolNotUpdated
errors.msg: The stake pool must be updated before continuing

errors.name: EpochMaintenanceAlreadyComplete
errors.msg: Epoch Maintenance has already been completed

errors.name: ValidatorsNeedToBeRemoved
errors.msg: Validators are marked for immediate removal

errors.name: ValidatorNotMarkedForRemoval
errors.msg: Validator not marked for removal

errors.name: ValidatorsHaveNotBeenRemoved
errors.msg: Validators have not been removed

errors.name: ListStateMismatch
errors.msg: Validator List count does not match state machine

errors.name: VoteAccountDoesNotMatch
errors.msg: Vote account does not match

errors.name: ValidatorNeedsToBeMarkedForRemoval
errors.msg: Validator needs to be marked for removal

errors.name: InvalidStakeState
errors.msg: Invalid stake state

types.name: BitMask
docs: Data structure used to efficiently pack a binary array, primarily used to store all validators.
Each validator has an index (its index in the spl_stake_pool::ValidatorList), corresponding to a bit in the bitmask.
When an operation is executed on a validator, the bit corresponding to that validator's index is set to 1.
When all bits are 1, the operation is complete.

types.name: Config
docs: Config is a user-provided keypair.
This is so there can be multiple configs per stake pool, and one party can't
squat a config address for another party's stake pool.

fields.name: stake_pool
docs: SPL Stake Pool address that this program is managing

fields.name: validator_list
docs: Validator List

fields.name: admin
docs: Admin
- Update the `parameters_authority`
- Update the `blacklist_authority`
- Can call SPL Passthrough functions
- Can pause/reset the state machine

fields.name: parameters_authority
docs: Parameters Authority
- Can update steward parameters

fields.name: blacklist_authority
docs: Blacklist Authority
- Can add to the blacklist
- Can remove from the blacklist

fields.name: validator_history_blacklist
docs: Bitmask representing index of validators that are not allowed delegation
NOTE: This is indexed off of the validator history, NOT the validator list

fields.name: parameters
docs: Parameters for scoring, delegation, and state machine

fields.name: paused
docs: Halts any state machine progress

fields.name: _padding
docs: Padding for future governance parameters

types.name: InstantUnstakeComponents
docs: Deprecated: This struct is no longer emitted but is kept to allow parsing of old events.
Because the event discriminator is based on struct name, it's important to rename the struct if
fields are changed.

fields.name: instant_unstake
docs: Aggregate of all checks

fields.name: delinquency_check
docs: Checks if validator has missed > instant_unstake_delinquency_threshold_ratio of votes this epoch

fields.name: commission_check
docs: Checks if validator has increased commission > commission_threshold

fields.name: mev_commission_check
docs: Checks if validator has increased MEV commission > mev_commission_bps_threshold

fields.name: is_blacklisted
docs: Checks if validator was added to blacklist

fields.name: details
docs: Details about why a given check was calculated

fields.name: epoch_credits_latest
docs: Latest epoch credits

fields.name: vote_account_last_update_slot
docs: Latest vote account update slot

fields.name: total_blocks_latest
docs: Latest total blocks

fields.name: cluster_history_slot_index
docs: Cluster history slot index

fields.name: commission
docs: Commission value

fields.name: mev_commission
docs: MEV commission value

types.name: LargeBitMask
docs: Data structure used to efficiently pack a binary array, primarily used to store all validators.
Each validator has an index (its index in the spl_stake_pool::ValidatorList), corresponding to a bit in the bitmask.
When an operation is executed on a validator, the bit corresponding to that validator's index is set to 1.
When all bits are 1, the operation is complete.

fields.name: mev_commission_range
docs: Number of epochs to consider for MEV commission

fields.name: epoch_credits_range
docs: Number of epochs to consider for epoch credits

fields.name: commission_range
docs: Number of epochs to consider for commission

fields.name: mev_commission_bps_threshold
docs: Highest MEV commission rate allowed in bps

fields.name: scoring_delinquency_threshold_ratio
docs: Proportion of delinquent slots to total slots to trigger delinquency measurement in scoring

fields.name: instant_unstake_delinquency_threshold_ratio
docs: Proportion of delinquent slots to total slots to trigger instant unstake

fields.name: commission_threshold
docs: Highest commission rate allowed in commission_range epochs, in percent

fields.name: historical_commission_threshold
docs: Highest commission rate allowed in tracked history

fields.name: _padding_0
docs: Required so that the struct is 8-byte aligned
https://doc.rust-lang.org/reference/type-layout.html#reprc-structs

fields.name: num_delegation_validators
docs: Number of validators to delegate to

fields.name: scoring_unstake_cap_bps
docs: Maximum amount of the pool to be unstaked in a cycle for scoring (in basis points)

fields.name: stake_deposit_unstake_cap_bps
docs: Maximum amount of the pool to be unstaked in a cycle from stake deposits (in basis points)

fields.name: compute_score_slot_range
docs: Number of slots that scoring must be completed in

fields.name: instant_unstake_epoch_progress
docs: Progress in epoch before instant unstake is allowed

fields.name: instant_unstake_inputs_epoch_progress
docs: Validator history copy_vote_account and Cluster History must be updated past this epoch progress before calculating instant unstake

fields.name: num_epochs_between_scoring
docs: Number of epochs a given validator set will be delegated to before recomputing scores

fields.name: minimum_stake_lamports
docs: Minimum stake required to be added to pool ValidatorList and eligible for delegation

fields.name: minimum_voting_epochs
docs: Minimum epochs voting required to be in the pool ValidatorList and eligible for delegation

types.name: ScoreComponents
docs: Deprecated: This struct is no longer emitted but is kept to allow parsing of old events.
Because the event discriminator is based on struct name, it's important to rename the struct if
fields are changed.

fields.name: score
docs: Product of all scoring components

fields.name: yield_score
docs: vote_credits_ratio * (1 - commission)

fields.name: mev_commission_score
docs: If max mev commission in mev_commission_range epochs is less than threshold, score is 1.0, else 0

fields.name: blacklisted_score
docs: If validator is blacklisted, score is 0.0, else 1.0

fields.name: superminority_score
docs: If validator is not in the superminority, score is 1.0, else 0.0

fields.name: delinquency_score
docs: If delinquency is not > threshold in any epoch, score is 1.0, else 0.0

fields.name: running_jito_score
docs: If validator has a mev commission in the last 10 epochs, score is 1.0, else 0.0

fields.name: commission_score
docs: If max commission in commission_range epochs is less than commission_threshold, score is 1.0, else 0.0

fields.name: historical_commission_score
docs: If max commission in all validator history epochs is less than historical_commission_threshold, score is 1.0, else 0.0

fields.name: vote_credits_ratio
docs: Average vote credits in last epoch_credits_range epochs / average blocks in last epoch_credits_range epochs
Excluding current epoch

fields.name: details
docs: Details about why a given score was calculated

fields.name: max_mev_commission
docs: Max MEV commission observed

fields.name: max_mev_commission_epoch
docs: Epoch of max MEV commission

fields.name: superminority_epoch
docs: Epoch when superminority was detected

fields.name: delinquency_ratio
docs: Ratio that failed delinquency check

fields.name: delinquency_epoch
docs: Epoch when delinquency was detected

fields.name: max_commission
docs: Max commission observed

fields.name: max_commission_epoch
docs: Epoch of max commission

fields.name: max_historical_commission
docs: Max historical commission observed

fields.name: max_historical_commission_epoch
docs: Epoch of max historical commission

types.name: StewardState
docs: Tracks state of the stake pool.
Follow state transitions here:
https://github.com/jito-foundation/stakenet/blob/master/programs/steward/state-machine-diagram.png

fields.name: state_tag
docs: Current state of the Steward

fields.name: validator_lamport_balances
docs: Internal lamport balance of each validator, used to track stake deposits that need to be unstaked,
so not always equal to the stake account balance.

fields.name: scores
docs: Overall score of validator, used to determine delegates and order for delegation.

fields.name: sorted_score_indices
docs: Indices of validators, sorted by score descending

fields.name: yield_scores
docs: Yield component of the score. Used as secondary priority, to determine order for unstaking.

fields.name: sorted_yield_score_indices
docs: Indices of validators, sorted by yield score descending

fields.name: delegations
docs: Target share of pool represented as a proportion, indexed by spl_stake_pool::ValidatorList index

fields.name: instant_unstake
docs: Each bit represents a validator, true if validator should be unstaked

fields.name: progress
docs: Tracks progress of states that require one instruction per validator

fields.name: validators_for_immediate_removal
docs: Marks a validator for immediate removal after `remove_validator_from_pool` has been called on the stake pool
This happens when a validator is able to be removed within the same epoch as it was marked

fields.name: validators_to_remove
docs: Marks a validator for removal after `remove_validator_from_pool` has been called on the stake pool
This is cleaned up in the next epoch

fields.name: start_computing_scores_slot
docs: Slot of the first ComputeScores instruction in the current cycle

fields.name: current_epoch
docs: Internal current epoch, for tracking when epoch has changed

fields.name: next_cycle_epoch
docs: Next cycle start

fields.name: num_pool_validators
docs: Number of validators in the stake pool, used to determine the number of validators to be scored.
Updated at the start of each cycle and when validators are removed.

fields.name: scoring_unstake_total
docs: Total lamports that have been due to scoring this cycle

fields.name: instant_unstake_total
docs: Total lamports that have been due to instant unstaking this cycle

fields.name: stake_deposit_unstake_total
docs: Total lamports that have been due to stake deposits this cycle

fields.name: status_flags
docs: Flags to track state transitions and operations

fields.name: validators_added
docs: Number of validators added to the pool in the current cycle

fields.name: _padding0
docs: Future state and #[repr(C)] alignment

types.name: U8Bool
docs: A boolean type stored as a u8.
